mapper.select: select exa_num, date_format(Estart_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as Estart_time, date_format(Estop_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as Estop_time, freeze, date_format(Bstart_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as Bstart_time, date_format(Bend_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as Bend_time from test_time where Bend_time > now() order by Bend_time ASC limit 1;

select exa_num, date_format(Estart_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as Estart_time, date_format(Estop_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as Estop_time, freeze, date_format(Bstart_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as Bstart_time, date_format(Bend_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as Bend_time from test_time order by Estart_time, Bstart_time limit #{fromIndex}, #{amount};
mapper.update: update test_time set Estart_time = #{Estart_time}, Estop_time = #{Estop_time}, freeze = #{freeze}, Bstart_time = #{Bstart_time}, Bend_time = #{Bend_time} where exa_num = #{exa_num};
